execution_plan.description: Get the id(s) of the customer(s) whose last name is 'LOGAN'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE lastname = 'LOGAN';

execution_plan.description: Get receipt numbers for receipts issued to the customer(s) found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE CustomerId IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Find items equal to 'Croissant' for receipts found in step 2; this yields the receipt numbers where Croissant was purchased.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, Item FROM items WHERE Item = 'Croissant' AND Receipt IN ($step2.ReceiptNumber);
